resources.string: Is that true what they say about computers?

string-array.name: quotes
string-array.item: \" We can teach a computer how to say I love you, however we cannot teach it to how to love.\"\n - Albert Jacquard
\"Today we can make music using computers, but the computer has always existed in the head of compositors. \"\n - Milan Kundera
\"Computers make many things easier, but the most part of these things that are made easier are unnecessary.\"\n - Andy Rooney
\"Softwares are just like sex - they are better when they are for free...\"\n - Linus Torvalds
